attributes.action: Hand over security in Iraq to the United Nations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Innocent civilians are dying everyday in Iraq. The continued US and British military presence is fuelling, rather than appeasing, violence in the region. These attrocities cannot be allowed to continue. I urge you to pull your troops out of Iraq and hand over security to a neutral and legal UN peacekeeping force so that stability can be restored.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
